description:
FIND FREQUENCY OF CIFTI LABELS.

This command outputs a set of soft ROIs, one for each label in the input, where the value is how many of the input maps had that label at that vertex/voxel, divided by the number of input maps.

probability-dscalar-out.description: the relative frequencies of each label at each vertex/voxel

exclude-unlabeled.description: don't make a probability map of the unlabeled key

label-maps.description: cifti dlabel file containing individual label maps from many subjects
